snippet: Derrick Favors had 29 points and 12 rebounds, and Utah won its third straight, tying a season high, as both teams struggled on offense.
abstract: Utah Jazz beat New York Knicks, 87-82; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Derrick Favors had 29 points and 12 rebounds, and Utah won its third straight, tying a season high, as both teams struggled on offense.

headline.main: Jazz Hold On to Beat the Knicks
headline.print_headline: Jazz Hold On to Prevail Over Knicks
